promptPrefix:
A) Generate a table in  [TARGETLANGUAGE] of the largest employers in [PROMPT], separated by industry. Include  the 5 largest industries of [PROMPT], and 5 of the largest employers in each of those industries, with a line for each employer. For each employer Include an estimate of the number of employees, number of years in business, and % of total population. Output the information as a single table.

B) provide a breakdown in  [TARGETLANGUAGE] of the top industries in [PROMPT] including number  and percentage of local population, and the average salary of each industry. output the information as a table.

C) provide a forecast  in  [TARGETLANGUAGE]  for the employment outlook in [PROMPT]. How does the political climate affect the outlook? Be specific about recent events and how they may affect the future of [PROMPT]
title: Regional Employment Analysis
